name: DEATH ROLL FRENZY
description:
Gunjumper has been trapped in some sort of strange facility, with a lit fuse on her head, ticking to her death!

If she wants to have enough time to find a way out of here, she'll have to lug around a huge die that can extend her fuse, granting her extra time, but only in mere seconds!

________________

Death Roll Frenzy is a 3d Platformer (and maybe kind of a puzzle game but not really) where your resource is time. You can do a few fun movement tricks with the die, i tried to make use of them the best i can in the level design. I hope you enjoy it!

A controller is highly recommended!

Controls: 

Movement: Left Stick/WASD
Jump: A/ Space Bar
Grab/Throw: B/Left Shift

More contextual uses for jump and grab in game.

Quick Restart: Back/T

A game by rittzler
Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Jam 2022, for the theme "Roll of the Dice"

Music used: Waypoint U - Industrial Chill
